description:
For focused training that yields results, the consistency and accuracy of power-based training cannot be beat. This unit is as low-profile and lightweight as a power meter gets – 20 grams, with a minimal housing and sleek front profile. You can expect wattage readings to be accurate within 2%. ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart compatibility make it good to go with pretty much any major GPS or cycling computer on the planet. Using a compact, easy to source, coin cell battery, the battery life is over 200+ hours, and you can swap it out quickly without tools.

  • Comes pre-mounted to proprietary Stages Power carbon non-drive crank
  • Stages Power crank is compatible with 386EVO model cranks
  • Crank can be retrofitted to SRAM and Truvativ BB30 cranks using Stages BB30 spindles (available seperately)
  • Not compatible with SRAM GXP bottom brackets
  • Not compatible with triple-ring cranks
  • Low-profile front face for minimal resistance
  • Fully sealed unit with IPX 7 waterproofing
  • Power is measured in kilograms via strain gauges and is mathematically converted to Watts
  • Active temperature compensation provides accurate readings
  • Accelerometer-based cadence readings keep your bike free of wires, magnets, zip-ties and other hardware
  • Specifications: accuracy: ± 2%, power range (Watts): 0 to 2500, cadence range (rpm): 20-220
  • Wireless firmware upgrades keep the unit future-proof
  • ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart compatibility
  • Software compatibility: Training Peaks, Strava, Garmin Training Center and others
  • CR2032 battery lasts 200+ hours and is replaceable without tools
  • Fits most bike frames
name: Stages Power Meter - FSA  & SRAM BB30
